movie.title: Shrek
movie.writer: William Steig (book), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay), Joe Stillman (screenplay), Roger S.H. Schulman (screenplay), Cody Cameron (additional dialogue), Chris Miller (additional dialogue), Conrad Vernon (additional dialogue)
movie.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow
movie.plot: An ogre, in order to regain his swamp, travels along with an annoying donkey in order to bring a princess to a scheming lord, wishing himself King.
